member.name: FontCollection.GetFamilies
member.summary: The FontCollection.GetFamilies method gets the font families contained in this font collection.
member.param: Integer that specifies the number of font families in this font collection.
Pointer to an array that receives the FontFamily objects.
Pointer to an INT that receives the number of font families found in this collection. This number should be the same as the numSought value.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration. If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the Status enumeration.

member.name: FontCollection.GetFamilyCount
member.summary: The FontCollection.GetFamilyCount method gets the number of font families contained in this font collection.
member.returns: This method returns the number of font families contained in this font collection.

member.name: FontCollection.GetLastStatus
member.summary: The FontCollection.GetLastStatus method returns a value that indicates the result of this FontCollection object's previous method call.

returns.para: The FontCollection.GetLastStatus method returns an element of the enumeration.
If the previous method invoked on this FontCollection object succeeded, FontCollection.GetLastStatus returns Ok.
If the previous method failed, then FontCollection.GetLastStatus returns one of the other elements of the enumeration that indicates the nature of the failure.
